ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: except an old woman among those who stayed behind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Except an old woman who was one of those who stayed behind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: except for an old woman who was among those that stayed behind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: except for an old woman who remained behind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Except an old woman, who became of those who stayed behind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Except an old woman (his wife) who was among those who remained behind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Except an old woman (who was) amongst those who tarried.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: save an old woman among those that tarried;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Save an old woman among those who stayed behind;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: except for an old woman who stayed behind,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Save an old woman among the lingerers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: excepting an old woman among those who remained behind,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Except an old woman who was among those who lagged behind:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Except an old woman (his wife) who was among those who remained behind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: except an old woman who lingered,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Except for an old woman who lagged behind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Except his wife among those who remained [with the evildoers].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:135] except an old woman [who was] among those who stayed behind, in other words, those who stayed behind in the chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Save an old woman among those who stayed behind) except his hypocrite wife who stayed behind with those who were destroyed;
